about_the_game:
Joe Wheelers Night Life VR - Nightclubbing in the Metaverse

Step into the ultimate virtual nightlife experience with Joe Wheelers Night Life VR! Customize your avatar, chill in your private home, or dive into vibrant nightclubs where music, lights, and fun await.

Features:

  • Private Home Hub:
    Start in your own personal space. Create your avatar, enjoy online radio, or kick back and watch shows on your virtual TV.

  • Dynamic Nightclub Experiences:
    Access a bustling nightclub with live DJ performances, stunning visuals, DJ lights, and interactive mini-games. Dance, chat, and connect with other partygoers in real time.

  • Exclusive Private Nightclubs:
    Use passcodes to access private nightclubs, perfect for enjoying DJ shows solo or with a select group of friends.

  • Live DJ Events:
    Join scheduled events featuring live performances from talented DJs for an unforgettable night out in the metaverse.

Whether you're looking to relax at home, meet new people, or throw shapes on the dancefloor, Joe Wheelers Night Life VR offers a unique and immersive clubbing experience—anytime, anywhere.

name: Night Life VR - Nightclubbing in the Metaverse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or greater.
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 470/570 or greater.
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest Pro, Rift S.
  • Additional Notes: USB 3.0 for VR Headsets. This app has not been tested on other headsets!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 or greater.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD RX 590 or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest 2, Quest 3, Quest Pro, Rift S.
  • Additional Notes: USB 3.0 for VR Headsets. This app has not been tested on other headsets!
